short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kito.io Support software, kito Serial TCP communication bridge

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a kito.io support software to hit the road running creating Your Internet of Your Things with kito.io
It is used to connect your Arduino to the kito.io IOT Platform if you do not have a wifi, ethernet board or shield  yet.
If you have an Arduino, sign up at kito.io, follow the examples and you will control your Arduino from your phone in few minutes, try it for free!
